title: Eksamen IMT3004 (2018) — Multiple Choice Questions (16 points)
description: Utvalgte flervalgsoppgaver fra IMT3004-eksamenen 2018. Bruk til øving og selvtesting.

questions.question: What comes first of these actions in the incident handling life cycle?
What should be the first step when building a CSIRT?
What initial attack vector was used in the 2015 attack on the Ukrainian power grid?
Which malware caused $300,000,000 in damages to the shipping company Maersk?
Which CSIRT organizational model usually has the most diverse constituency?
choices: Internal combined distributed and centralized CSIRT

questions.question: Which of these CSIRT services is a proactive service?
What standard maintained by FIRST (Forum of Incident Response and Security Teams) calculates a numerical scoring of the severity of a specific vulnerability
Which TLP marking should be used for sharing information that recipients may only share within their organization on a need to know basis?
Which of these incident indicators is an example of a definite indicator of an actual incident?
What data collection activity creates the largest amount of data to analyze?
Which intrusion detection approach is best for detecting new types of attacks?
What is the most important step you can do to prepare to respond to a DDoS incident?
Which of these is a common DDoS reflection and amplification vector?
What is an example of an atomic indicator?
In what phase in the intrusion kill chain model will a NIDPS usually detect an intrusion?
Which of these tools is used for sharing indicators between CSIRTs?
